structuring.name: Structuring / Smurfing
structuring.description: Breaking large amounts into smaller deposits below reporting thresholds to avoid detection
indicators: Multiple deposits just below INR 10,00,000 threshold
Multiple deposits on same day or consecutive days
structuring.pmla_reference: Section 12 of PMLA, 2002 - Obligation to furnish information of prescribed transactions
structuring.rbi_reference: RBI Master Direction on KYC - Cash Transaction Reporting

layering.name: Layering
layering.description: Moving money through multiple accounts and financial instruments to obscure the trail
indicators: Use of intermediary accounts with no apparent business purpose
Complex web of transactions designed to break the audit trail
layering.pmla_reference: Section 3 of PMLA, 2002 - Offence of money laundering
layering.rbi_reference: RBI Guidelines on Wire Transfer Regulations

wire_fraud.name: Wire Fraud / Cross-Border Transfer
wire_fraud.description: Suspicious wire transfers especially to high-risk jurisdictions
indicators: Large outward remittances inconsistent with income
No clear business purpose for transfers
Rapid movement of funds after receipt
wire_fraud.pmla_reference: Section 3 read with Section 12 of PMLA, 2002

cash_business.name: Cash-Intensive Business Fraud
cash_business.description: Suspicious cash transactions from businesses claiming cash-intensive operations
indicators: Immediate electronic transfers after cash deposits
cash_business.pmla_reference: Section 12(1)(b) of PMLA, 2002 - Suspicious transaction reporting
cash_business.rbi_reference: RBI Circular on Cash Deposit Monitoring

identity_theft.name: Identity Theft / Synthetic Identity
identity_theft.description: Accounts opened using stolen or fabricated identity documents
identity_theft.rbi_reference: RBI Master Direction on KYC - Customer Identification

rapid_movement.name: Rapid Movement of Funds
rapid_movement.description: Funds moved immediately after receipt, suggesting pass-through activity
indicators: Credits and debits within same day
No holding period for received funds
Large credits immediately followed by large debits

round_tripping.name: Round-Tripping
round_tripping.description: Sending money abroad and bringing it back as foreign investment
indicators: Outward remittance followed by inward investment
round_tripping.pmla_reference: Section 3 of PMLA, 2002 read with FEMA regulations
